data.comment: The match has started, with Ajax kicking-off.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Lassina Franck Traore.
In the minute 6, Great play from David Neres to set up the goal.
Lucas Schoofs (Almelo) has received a yellow card from Jeroen Manschot.
The home team replace Davy Klaassen with Jurgen Ekkelenkamp.
In the minute 29, Great finish from David Neres to give Ajax a 2-0 lead.
Ryan Gravenberch instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! Ajax extend their lead to 3-0 through Zakaria Labyad.
In the minute 36, Dusan Tadic with an assist there.
Almelo's Rai Vloet has been booked in Amsterdam.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half has commenced. Almelo with the kick-off.
The home team have replaced Noussair Mazraoui with Sean Klaiber. This is the second substitution made today by Erik ten Hag.
Delano Burgzorg is replacing Sinan Bakis for the away team.
In the minute 57, Frank Wormuth is making the team's second substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Tim Breukers replacing Lucas Schoofs.
Ismail Azzaoui is replacing Orestis Kiomourtzoglou for Almelo at Johan Cruijff Arena.
It's now 4-0 in Amsterdam as Dusan Tadic scores for Ajax.
In the minute 58, That's a fine assist from Zakaria Labyad.
Quincy Promes is on a sub for Dusan Tadic for Ajax.
Erik ten Hag (Ajax) is making a fourth substitution, with Klaas-Jan Huntelaar replacing Daley Blind.
In the minute 70, Ajax make their fifth substitution with Lisandro Martinez replacing Lassina Franck Traore.
The away team has substituted Robin Propper with Marco Rente. Frank Wormuth is thus making his fourth change.
Frank Wormuth is making the team's fifth substitution at Johan Cruijff Arena with Giacomo Quagliata replacing Jeff Hardeveld.
In the minute 72, At Johan Cruijff Arena, Teun Bijleveld has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Ajax take a comfortable 5-0 lead thanks to Zakaria Labyad.
The match has come to a close in Amsterdam. The final score is 5-0.
